title: Upscale 2nd Chance Apartments with Pool Near Shopping and Dining!
posting_body: ['1B, 820 sqft, $1870/month', '2B, 986 sqft, $1909/month', 'Second Chance Criteria: Evictions and broken leases accepted at 5 years old, must be paid in full.', 'Misdemeanors and felonies accepted on a case-by-case basis.', 'Income must be at least 3 times monthly rent.', 'Community Amenities:', '24-Hour Fitness Center', 'Cyber Cafe and Business Center', 'Hydrotherapy Spas', 'Summer Kitchen with Al Fresco Dining Area', 'Centrally Located Package Management System', 'Close to Shopping and Entertainment', 'Located Along DART Bus Line 401', 'Apartment Amenities:', 'Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring', '9’ Ceilings with Crown Molding', 'Ceiling Fans with Light Kit', 'Breakfast Bar in Kitchen', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Expansive Walk-In Closets', 'Pet Friendly', 'Pet Restrictions: Maximum of 2 pets per household, breed restrictions apply', 'Contact us for more info!', 'Kalisha Norman, REALTOR ®', 'Novus Real Estate/Big State Locators', 'Text/call', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
